description:
Yihe yuan / Summer palace

Country: China
Genre: Drama, Romance Novel
Year: 2006
Duration: 2:14:33

Subtitle: Russian

Directed by: Ye Lou

Cast: Go Syaodona, Hao Lei, Bai Syueyun, Hu Lin, Cui Lin, Duan Long, Zhang Xianming

Description: Yu Hong leaves her village, her parents and her lover, and went to study in Beijing. At university, she discovers a new world full of sexual freedom and forbidden pleasures. Absorbed by this freedom, she falls in love with fellow student Zhou Wei. The passion that they can neither understand nor retain, fills their relationship betrayal, recrimination and endless provocations. Meanwhile, the Beijing students begin to organize demonstrations demanding democracy and freedom. Amidst the chaos and panic Yu and Zhou lose each other. Zhou is sent to a military camp, coming from where he flies to Berlin, leaving his country and memories of Yu. And she finds a job and a lover, but he can not forget Zhou ...
